descript.abstract: This dataset represents state water trails in the State of Minnesota as designated through legislation and recognized by the Department of Natural Resources. The alignments represent the approximate river centerlines as interpreted from 2009 aerial photographs. The alignments were created at a scale between 1:2000 and 1:10000.
descript.purpose: Use this layer to show state monitored recreation canoeing and kayaking opportunities.

timeperd.current: Initial data was provided by the Hydro rivers centerline data and has since been edited with use of 2003 and 2008 aerial photography. In March 2010 the trails were edited with the use of 2009 FSA aerial imagery. These edits were made to all Minnesota Water Trails.

theme.themekey: Water Trails, Canoe and Boating Routes, Kayak Trail

idinfo.useconst: Free for public use, cannot be sold or used as legal information and should be understood as an approximation of the water trail location.

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team

dataqual.logic: Data are topologically correct using internal editing tools at the DNR.
dataqual.complete: All designated water trails are included in their entirety.

procstep.procdesc: This dataset is derived and regularly updated from the DNR WHEELS Database.

attracc.attraccr: Contents are periodically reviewed for accuracy and corrected as necessary to improve accuracy.

enttyp.enttypd: Attribute table. Field names refer to the actual names of fields in the table; displayed field names (aliases) are defined in the field definition where applicable.

attr.attrdef: Field alias: Trail Name. Name of state water trail.
Field alias: Program Project. 8-character Program/Project Code of state water trail.
Field alias: Unit Name. Unit Name for state water trail.
Field alias: Administered By. Division or entity that administers this state water trail.
Field alias: Maintained By. Division or entity that maintains the state water trail.
Field alias: Length (Miles). Length of state water trail in miles.
Length of state water trail segment in meters.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team
